feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
